PAD.interfaceKit.component

Class ComponentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • PAD.interfaceKit.component.ComponentHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ButtonComponent, MagnetComponent, PressurePlateComponent

    public abstract class ComponentHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A parent for all the input component, this class will progress and read input components every new input component should extend this class in order to be read
